name: The City for All
description:
You are an architect in a new city, one that you know is ever-changing to the needs and desires of its residents. You are assigned to various neighbourhoods, where you must talk with the local residents about their issues, restructuring their neighbourhood to their likings. As anyone may tell you, it’s difficult to try pleasing everybody, but somebody’s gotta try!

Game Design Doc: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PpMnvhwZfwvE0-MaRV-Ba_Z6jVTYYQLqBvRT4D66rO4/...

*Note: Game is best enjoyed in full screen!*

Controls

ASDW - Move

Left Click - Place block / talk

Right Click - Destroy block

Q/E - Cycle inventory
